sentences.sContent: This new nano-technology is only available in Anabolic Rush!
sentences.sContent_eng: This new nano-technology is only available in Anabolic Rush!
sentences.sCn: 这种新的纳米技术仅在同化拉什提供！

sentences.sContent: Many scientists consider nano-technology to be the science of the future.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many scientists consider nano-technology to be the science of the future.
sentences.sCn: 许多科学家认为纳米技术是未来科学研究的主流。

sentences.sContent: The introduction of Sweden's most authoritative international nanotechnology, add value to their products, become the first in the textile fabrics used in nano-technology enterprises.
sentences.sContent_eng: The introduction of Sweden's most authoritative international nanotechnology, add value to their products, become the first in the textile fabrics used in nano-technology enterprises.
sentences.sCn: 引进国际最权威的瑞典纳米技术，增加产品的附加值，成为国内率先在纺织品面料中使用纳米技术的企业。

trans.tranOther: Nanotechnology is the science of making or working with things that are so small that they can only be seen using a powerful microscope
